items.sentence: Tom was exactly where Mary said he would be.
Tom was fast asleep when the telephone rang.
Tom was finally able to get his car started.
I thought that Tom was interested in sports.
I thought that was what Tom wanted me to do.
I thought this was something we both wanted.
Tom could\'ve killed you if he\'d wanted to.
Tom can be pig-headed and stubborn at times.
Tom will be happy to know that you\'re safe.
Let\'s see what you\'ve been hiding from us.
Let\'s stop by Tom\'s house and talk to him.
Let\'s study for next week\'s test together.
Can we have pancakes for breakfast tomorrow?
Can you account for all the money you spent?
I appreciate everything Tom has done for me.
It was very exciting! I\'d like to go again.
It would\'ve been nice if Tom had been here.
Kids are building sand castles on the beach.
Kissing a smoker is like licking an ashtray.
Did Tom say what the meeting would be about?
